original_title: The Hidden River of My Life
overview: A multimedia work set to Sufjan Stevens’ “The Hidden River of My Life” illustrates a cosmic, yet deeply intimate exploration of humankind: our past, our present, and the places we might go.  Produced as a 2019 grad film at Emily Carr University of Art & Design in Vancouver, B.C.

production_companies.name: Emily Carr University of Art + Design

title: The Hidden River of My Life
